fields.title: Gone Girl
fields.review: One of the best movies I have ever watched! A movie that interrogates the true meaning of commitment. Would highly recommend!

fields.title: La La Land
fields.review: Have heard wonderful things about this movie. Furthermore, Emma Stone was awarded an Academy Award for her role in this film, cementing her place as a top actress

fields.title: Marriage Story
fields.review: A deeply personal movie that touches people's hearts. Wonderful performance from Johansson and Driver. Have rewatched several times, would highly recommend.

fields.title: Avatar
fields.review: A movie that holds the title of highest-grossing film. Reviewers have described it as 'visually spellbinding'.

fields.title: Mean Girls
fields.review: A teen comedy film centering on a popular high school clique. Although humorous, Mean Girls reveals how everyone, deep inside, is a mean girl. Great acting, great casting, great screen writing. Truly deserves the cult following it has amassed.

fields.title: Soul
fields.review: Was personally reommended by friend who loves this movie. Tells a story of a New York jazz pianist.

fields.title: Artificial Intelligence: AI
fields.review: My first Spielberg movie. Visually stunning and the plot is not awful, but I have watched better movies.

fields.title: Mean Girls 2
fields.review: Considering how big of a hit the first movie was, Mean Girls 2 was a huge disappointment. You are better off rewatching the original Mean Girls

fields.title: Friend Zone
fields.review: A heartwarming movie. I would highly recommend.

fields.title: The Royal Tenenbaums
fields.review: A thrilling experience visually. Was my first Wes Anderson movie. I loved Gwyneth Paltrow in this movie.
